name: Jewelry Galore
tag_list: ecommerce, jewelry, wholesale, jewelry-galore, stores, online
description: Wholesale Jewelry For B2B and B2C buyers
overview:
JewelryGalore.com is a New York City based Jewelry company that was founded with a rebellious objective to provide unique accessories online, so shopping for accessories is made easy.

JewelryGalore.com brings the 100,000+ jewelry boutiques online by selecting the best of the best and pricing everything fairly while topping everything off with excellent service. A one-of-kind online destination for discovering and exploring new designs across the country, JewelryGalore.com has unbelievable designs that will keep you coming back for more. Offering an expertly curated selection of top accessories with one-of-a-kind pieces, JewelryGalore.com helps women discover, celebrate and even reinvent their personal style with ease by eliminating the hassle of searching through hundreds of sites for the perfect jewels.

Jewelry Galore also caters to businesses in markets such as New York, Texas, and California via it’s wholesale operations and it’s website.
